price: 67. Ibrâhîm azalaki moyuda mpe moklisto te. Kasi azalaki nde hanifa(1) mondimi, mpe azalaki te elongo na baye basangisaki (Allah).
arabic: مَا كَانَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ يَهُودِيّٗا وَلَا نَصۡرَانِيّٗا وَلَٰكِن كَانَ حَنِيفٗا مُّسۡلِمٗا وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
footnotes: 1 Kolongua na bosangisi Allah тропа komisokia na Allah ye moko.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna ib'rāhīmu yahūdiyyan walā naṣrāniyyan walākin kāna ḥanīfan mus'liman wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
